attributes.review: I was sitting next to my boss and i downloaded the Trump app to be aware of the next rally’s and i submitted my phone number and about two minutes later my phone gets SPAMMED with nude pictures of older men. I was completely horrified. I had to explain to my boss that this app spammed my number and i’m worried he thinks different of me now. I do not recommend downloading the app.
attributes.title: Completely Embarrassed

attributes.review: Just was looking around the App Store one night for some fun games, and I came across this app. I downloaded it for fun and a good time and it was anything BUT. It literally made my phone DISINTEGRATE and it let out a huge howl. I am actually typing this on my smart fridge because I am sadly left without a phone because of THIS APP! I mean if you want your phone to vanish in thin air then yes I would recommend. ❤️
attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: This app literally messes up your phone. I’ve gotten so many notifications it legit spams you and I even put don’t allow notifications and it still happened I DONT RECCOMEND IT ITS THE WORST APP!!😤 So that’s why I rated this app 1 ⭐️ because it’s literally just a waste of time for me and for others ;) so I better not see this app EVER AGAIN!!! Thanks😍 do the same thing if you agree with me thankssss hope u have a great dayy!! 💕💓
attributes.title: NOOO

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to become closer to my fellow racists and bigots and those expectations were met perfectly. However, my problem is mainly with the racists and bigots, especially the obese orange one. Now every time i try and fall asleep i have terrible sleep paralysis nightmares of said racist saying he would date his daughter. Absolutely wretched. I haven’t slept in weeks. Poor quality.
attributes.title: Absolutely Terrible

attributes.review: I tried inviting friends to get more points but it would NOT give me any. Also I was spammed with so many unnecessary notifications to the point where my phone began to lag and slow down. I’m going to get my phone checked tomorrow because I think I might have a virus. I couldn’t be more unimpressed with the quality of this app.
attributes.title: Annoying and unproductive app!

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app and was horrified to find a photo of trump fully nude pop onto my screen. My sister saw this and was in so much shock that she pulled her eyes out and fed them to me, and then proceeded to tell me she was now going to be pursuing the same path as Hellen Keller. I’m absolutely scarred and still have nightmares today and my sister still hasn’t spoken to me since. 
alright i’ll go cry now 🦟🦗🦟🦗🦟🦗
attributes.title: my sister is hellen keller

attributes.review: This app was the downfall of my career... I am an aspiring Connecticutian waitress, seamstress, and cumbia singer that loves Donald Trump🥵❤️ When I opened this app I was was greeted with hate speech towards Latino woman🤭🤧 a man then proceeded to hack me🤮 and send very disturbing images and videos🧐 I was disgusted😢 Then a man broke into my house, took my cat 😾, burned my house down, made me chug a gallon of milk🎐 and then tell him I’d vote for trump👄 i am so sad so i will be giving this app a 1 Star review🤤
attributes.title: Im scarred

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app and was highly disappointed. It’s just a picture of a moldy old shriveled tiny Cheeto. The app advertised that there are 2,020 “Trump”s. I’m not sure that that is but it must be terrible. This app is just False advertising and full of lies. To continue having this app in the Oval App Store will do nothing but cause mass harm to all phone users. Do not download this app and Certainly don’t review it. 
Karen out.
attributes.title: AOC 2024

attributes.review: this is. NO. please stop this, donald 😭 first of all, why are you trying to shut down tik tok. want to get rid of one of the biggest ways gen z expresses their first amendment? not a good political move cause this’ll cause outrage LOL i think ur just scared of the content on tik tok that bashes you, and the content that tries to help free ur son, PLUS the content that exposes you. anyways, this is our response to ur terrible app and terrible presidency 😿🦶💥
attributes.title: no

attributes.review: Upon opening this application I was greeted by a Cheeto puff 🎃 asking for my phone number. The respect nowadays 😤 I don’t even know the man and he already tryna hey jiggy with a minor 💅. After further scrolling, I saw SEVERAL images of this Cheeto NAKED getting a tan. My eyes will never be the same. I am now hospitalized for life 🏥 from puking my intestine out after seeing this app and these cursed photos. PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT I’M ON MY DEATH BED ☠️
attributes.title: Don’t download this app
